```{r}
#| include: false
library(filtro)
scores <- ls(pattern = "^score_", envir = asNamespace("filtro"))
scores <- sort(scores)
no_prefix <- gsub("^score_", "", scores)

f_ver <- packageDescription("filtro")$Version
```
